message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $14,000. I believe this product would be highly valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product is worth a significant amount to you. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet at $13,000. My maximum offer remains at $12,000.
